website_summaries.verdict: The unique TV-or-mobile gaming proposition of the Nintendo Switch is now matched by a stellar library of games, including instant-classics like new Zelda and Mario titles.
pros: The Nintendo Switch is a versatile hybrid game console that easily pivots between a big-screen TV and on-the-go portable
The initially slim game library now includes a good mixture of must-have Nintendo franchise exclusives, indie titles and even some decent PC ports
cons: No Virtual Console (yet) means no access to decades worth of classic Nintendo games
The screen feels small during tabletop sessions
Online multiplayer requires matchmaking on a smartphone app, and Hulu is the only entertainment app

customer_reviews.title: I got price gouged
customer_reviews.text: The Nintendo is cool and all but I got price gouged hard on it. I promised my kid one for Quarantine. Apparently people have been buying them out to resell on ebay and Amazon. I am one of those victims.
customer_reviews.author: robert a acord

customer_reviews.title: 0 stars SCAM
customer_reviews.text: False advertisement, I got the old version of the switch when it clearly is a picture of the new version, and it has in the dicription that it is a new version of the console. Don't waste your money on this, also they over charged me by almost 200$. If I wanted this version I would have paid a significant amount less. How have you not been sued yet. Disgusting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing console ruined by mentally ill scalpers
customer_reviews.text: This is easily a 5-star console. I've docked 4 stars because of the scalpers though. Don't give them your money. I gave this review 1 star because I so heavily advise against purchasing this. It's worth its MSRP, not what the scalpers are charging
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Wow how disappointing dont buy this until they get this improved, older version of this is better in my opinion. The newer version gave me 8+ crashes of system and game crashes leading up to finally unable to play this system having to return this system ,what a horrible experience this was. Being a big Nintendo switch player what a great disappointment this was. Hopefully they improve this newer version system to where this does not happen again or to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: zoconnies

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Good Seller, Console came with everything as specified on description. I'll upload some pictures so you can see the box and hardware quality.
customer_reviews.author: pedro sarmiento

customer_reviews.title: The old "Switch" and bait.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered new model (HAC-001 [01]), with better screen and battery life. Was sent discontinued model HAC-001 instead. New models serial starts with XKW, old starts with XAW. Be aware, I did my research and bought what was advertised as the updated model but got bit instead.
customer_reviews.author: William D Ulibarri II

customer_reviews.title: NO NEED to buy if you are not a super fan
customer_reviews.text: If you are not a super fan of animal corssing then I think you can just get the normal one. The price just go crazy and it doesn't worth it. If you really whant a cool colour one you can DIY. The photo is form my friend, it is not so hard to change those shell. You can buy the shells even on Amazon (though my friend get them from somewhere else).
customer_reviews.author: EXU

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is awesome
customer_reviews.text: New reversion is absolutely worth, games run smoothly, nice brightness and white balance. Awesome battery life
customer_reviews.author: Jose G. Perez Marrero

customer_reviews.title: Better than ever !
customer_reviews.text: Finally I could get a flawless Switch console in my hands , this one is perfect , battery life, even the joysticks feels more premium now. I super ultra buster mega recommend this one, best switch version ever.
customer_reviews.author: Joao Mota

customer_reviews.title: As advertised enhanced battery version
customer_reviews.text: As advertised this is the new version oh so happy got it the new battery life is just a charm thank you amazon
customer_reviews.author: Said

customer_reviews.title: I was mistaken
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it! I was mistaken, the promised model was the new nintendo switch with the code: HAC-001 (-01) but the model that was delivered was the old nintendo switch with the code: HAC-001 liars and thieves and that's what you are, shame
customer_reviews.author: Luiz Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Watch out buyer be aware.
customer_reviews.text: I was supposed to get the hac 001(01) but I got the older version. Feel a little ripped off but what can you do spent 200 more then what it is worth. They can't be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced! Don't pay more than $300 for it.
customer_reviews.text: I love my switch. So much so that my girlfriend has started wanting to use it too and I suggested she look into getting her own since she just bought a game but has no console of her own. We have looked everywhere and now they seem to be selling for $500 instead of the $300 that is normal. This should not be happening in a pandemic where people just want to stay home! So as to reduce the number of price gougers: AMAZON, PLEASE LIMIT THE NUMBER OF CONSOLES THAT A SINGLE ACCOUNT OR CREDIT CARD CAN BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Crites

customer_reviews.title: Jerk who raises the price by 200$
customer_reviews.text: It's suck a jerk move to raise the price by 200 plus dollars. Take the extra 200 and live a terrific life you jerk. Only reason I bought from you is because a) only one I could find b) it was my neices birthday and she's extremely sick. That's all she asked for but people like you do what you do best and upcharge. Have a great life.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: The product did not come with controllers. It had a bunch of post it notes instead.
customer_reviews.author: cho sung zoon

customer_reviews.title: Purchase new but got a used 1
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a new Nintendo Switch and what i received a used Nintendo Switch finger prints all over the screen and also food particles on the screen. im not kidding im so mad so disappointed because my son opened as an birthday gift .it still had the 3 peoples profiles who had it before.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Deal not valid! CS is not supportive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Black Friday! Item arrived in one day but the $25 gift card I was supposed to receive or be able to redeem seems to be a mystery. Been trying to get an answer from customer service for 30 min and I have been transferred 3x. I work in digital marketing with coupon codes and this is terrible execution: very disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Skipper

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE SWITCH!!! This switch is so cute and I honestly can’t wait to play animal crossing on this! The design on this switch is so beautiful like Nintendo did a good job on the color scheme and everything!!! Hopefully this switch keeps restocking so that everyone can get the chance to have their hands on this beauty for the original price and for those SCALPERS to stop raising the prices on the switch. (BTW for those scalpers reading this y’all are truly disgusting and selfish for not letting people who actually want the handheld system get their hands on it)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Preordered mine Feb 4th and just got it Mar 17th
customer_reviews.text: Giving the console a low review because of scalpers is NOT okay. The console is beautiful and I can't wait for it to come back into stock and screw over all of the scalpers. But come on people... don't review bomb it because someone is charging way too much for it. That's not fair.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Scammed by Amazon and nintendo
customer_reviews.text: Excited for my switch, but I guess nintendo thinks this is a better product.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Used product. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I'll write the positives after I use it but thoroughly disappointed in amazon. The unit is clearly used and opened, there's a blue sticker on the outside, and it's covered in fingerprints. A shame. Three stars off the bat. Hopefully I like this thing. After I CLEAN it. EDIT: Now this review has become a one star. There's no joycon controller center piece in here. Absolutely terrible quality control
customer_reviews.author: James Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Won't read game cartridge
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a brand new Nintendo Switch along with the game Pokemon Lets Go Evee. After setting up the console and following the instructions I inserted the game cartridge into the switch only to find that the my Nintendo Switch couldn't read the game cartridge. I tried trouble shooting the problem by looking up solutions online as well as contacting Nintendo customer support to fix the issue. Nothing worked and they recommended that I send it in to get it fixed which could take 3-4 weeks. As I am not sure if the problem is with the switch itself or with the game cartridge I am returning them both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got new, one of the controllers did not work
customer_reviews.text: I received it a couple of days earlier than expected, however one of the controllers was not recognized by the console, I followed the online directions, still nothing, ended up sending it back. Not happy, also Nintendo fix it shop is down with the virus so they wont fix anything until this is done. I know because when I went online to try to get it to work it was one of the notifications I got. I have to wonder if there is any quality control, a new product that costs this much should work.
customer_reviews.author: LRR

customer_reviews.title: Item Was Used
customer_reviews.text: Need to replace this Switch, 10 year old son woke up on Christmas morning and received this unit from Santa Claus, screen protector was already on it and user name Ronin had played over 200hrs. With that said the console is locked on Nintendo Switch Screen, horrible experience!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: It’s already broken less than 1 month use. And the window to return is closed.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Great product! After further review and updated news stories....the price was significantly inflated! Be advised...do better homework than I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not compatible to HP OfficeJet 6958
customer_reviews.text: Though it state it is the right model ink cartridge of this type of printer, it is not! You can tell the chip of these cartridges do not even look remotely like an original hp chip on their cartridge. do not buy!!! waste of time and money!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lahpai

customer_reviews.title: PRICE GOUGING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I generally don't write reviews and although the product is good the price was outrageous. Normally would have been 290.00 was charged over $500.00. Guess that's what happens when there is a pandemic. PRICE GOUGING.
customer_reviews.author: Micka53

customer_reviews.title: To gift or not to gift
customer_reviews.text: It lasted two weeks. Amazon would not give me a full refund because once this Christmas gift was returned to me it was over thirty days. Beware if you are buying a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Sent me a broken system. Has yet to provide a working one almost 3 weeks later.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Important factors to consider.
customer_reviews.text: The system is great. A lot of free games to download. Battery life can be better but good enough. Screen is large enough, but can be bigger. Games are more expensive then other consoles. Example 3rd party games $19.99 on other consoles PS4. Switch $39.99 to $49.99. No web browsing, no Netflix and other video apps besides Hulu and YouTube. Switch back stand feels flimsy. Seems it will brake if you use too much force. No Bluetooth headphones compatibility. Need extra dongle for that. Hands feels cramped up holding device after some time.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: worst purchase on Amazon ever
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine. During Black Friday they gave $25 promotional credit and advertised as it can be used on items sold by Amazon.com or Amazon Digital Services LLC. But when I try to buy game digital code from Amazon Digital services LLC the code never worked! I spent over 2 hrs on phone and chat with customer services and changed 6 customer support representatives and no one can help me out. Deceptive marketing/promo.
customer_reviews.author: George W

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FOR ANYTHING ABOVE $299!! (boo scalpers)
customer_reviews.text: I am so grateful I did not give into the scalpers... I know how unfair and unfortunate the scalping situation is, but the console itself really is not worth anything but $299 (plastic and basic). Please consider trying sites like stockinfo (where I finally got mine after like a month of searching) and save that money for all the games you’ll want :) Plus sticking it to the scalpers out there once it becomes widely available again makes the wait so much more worth it in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Do not Overpay, just be patient.
customer_reviews.text: If you watch the Amazon page, it comes into stock multiple times a day, but only for 3 mins or so before selling out. Refresh your browser until you catch one in the cart and check out asap. I nabbed it on the 4th try and it took 3 days. Happy Hunting! Its so fun!
customer_reviews.author: BFF

customer_reviews.title: 👍HDMI out to bigger screen and removable joycons!⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the extra hundred compared to the smaller switch lite. joycons fit and feel more ergonomic in palm and extra inch in screen is nice. I tried the switch lite first and the one main point that made me return and spend extra on this is the replacable joycons is buttons wear out. Though is nice that the lite version still allows for the pro controller to be wirelessly connected to it as well as the bigger original (OG) switch. :) I hope the next switch and switch lite version don't change much, but nintendo please update and allow the USB-C to be the video out on both.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: NOT A GOOD QUALITY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: CALLED FOR HELP - UNABLE TO GET HELP FROM NITENDO - AMAZONE CUSTOMER (ALLEN) HE SAID HE WILL CALL BACK FOR HELP NEXT DAY BUT HE NEVER CALL BACK - BOUGHT THIS SYSTEM FOR MY 10 BIRTHYDAY SPECIAL - MY KID- VERY DISAPPOINT IT - CAN NOT WAIT TOO LONG - HAVE TO RETURN IT
customer_reviews.author: Pisector

customer_reviews.title: Buyer before of upcharging.
customer_reviews.text: The game is fine. Got up-charged $100, because they could.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Don't listen to 1 star reviews.
customer_reviews.text: The main reason there are so many 1 star reviews is because When quarantine 1st started there was a price gouge.Now they've lowered it to the original price so you should just ignore those.My son loves it is helping stay in touch with his friends during quarantine and it has a wide variety of fun games.I think that you should should get this for your kids or yourself.😃
customer_reviews.author: melinda w.

customer_reviews.title: The first console to get me back into consoles
customer_reviews.text: I left consoles at the xbox 360 for PC and never looked back then Nintendo made the switch, the first handheld/TV console full of both Nintendo and 3rd party games. I love it! NOTE: you kind of need a case with grips for a good handheld experience you kind of need caps for the joysticks if you have big hands as the ones on it are low and slidey I didn't realize how much I missed owning cartridges
customer_reviews.author: Paul Birkholtz

customer_reviews.title: Good luck if you get a defective dock
customer_reviews.text: Dock fails to connect to the TV right out of the box. Contacted Nintendo and they required we send the entire system in, which would take up to 4-weeks, to repair. Customer service person was polite. $300 for a defective component. We will never purchase a Nintendo console again.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin R. Sanor

customer_reviews.title: Won’t turn on after a couple months.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for Christmas and they stopped working after 2 months. They won’t turn on. I have tried holding down the power button for 15 seconds and the release and then push it once and nothing happens. I have unplugged and plugged in the charging cord. Used different outlets. Tried different power cords and nothing happens. A lot of money for these to stop working. They didn’t even play them very much. Extremely upset that I am out so much money for these and they didn’t even last.
customer_reviews.author: A.W.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer service  and have to wait over 14 days for a refund.  Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: So I contact them to tell them it's defective and they reply. "if nintendo will repair it that may be the best option, but it is up to you " Buyers beware
customer_reviews.author: thezookeeper

customer_reviews.title: Very Dirty Switch I demand a replacement
customer_reviews.text: It came very dirty. Dark blobs of dirt on Joy cons and plenty of dirt and fingerprints all over the screen. This is absolutely unacceptable. I am returning it and I demand a replacement. Did I just buy a used Switch for full price???
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Back in Stock!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I found the deal of the century when it was back in stock and I grabbed on at normal price. Yay! This is an excellent Christmas gift (which I bought for myself) and I'm really excited to have the special edition Switch for myself without overpaying. Patience paid off and I'm so glad that Nintendo released another round of this.
customer_reviews.author: Amy PV

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished units break after little use.
customer_reviews.text: After a little over a month of (very light) use, the hdmi connection no longer works. The switch will still charge while in the dock, but I cannot play on the TV while in docked mode. I can confirm it is an issue with the refurbished switch as I have another switch that I use personally, that works with both docks, my original switch dock and the dock provided with the refurbished one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taker

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Beware that this a USED OVERPRICE Switch, NOT NEW. Double the MSRP of $299 new.
customer_reviews.author: Biggie

customer_reviews.title: No Game included
customer_reviews.text: Please don't think bundle means animal crossing game is with it because its not!!!! I feel mislead.. now I see where it says game not included but like many when it says Animal Crossing Bundle u just assume because of the price u get the game to!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Pockette

customer_reviews.title: It looked like beautiful and cute at first time.
customer_reviews.text: But soon I noticed that the dock can't recognize my switch..... So I asked replacement to Amazon customer center and they said only return is available. I had to send my dock to nintendo repair center cause they said it will only take a week to get a replacement. However they are closed now because of COVID-19 and don't know when they will re-open. I paid $100 more than Nintendo switch light and now I only have to play this small display not my 55" TV. It sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Likanyang

customer_reviews.title: Drift after three days of use.
customer_reviews.text: After three days of use I started experiencing drift. Not only that it was used and damaged. $500 for a broken switch is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: I received the correct version
customer_reviews.text: I received the newer model, as advertised and it has been great. No complaints on the system - it's exactly what I was looking for. Make sure to pay attention to which models go on sale this Black Friday. The newer one (red box) has a new graphics chip which allows better battery life and a slightly different screen.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Defective joycons ruin an otherwise perfect console
customer_reviews.text: Almost everything about this console is perfect but the joy cons are flawed and Nintendo continues to ship the defective line as standard issue in switch and switch lite
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Barba

customer_reviews.title: What an improvement!
customer_reviews.text: The new battery life is amazing. I bought this for my significant other for our anniversary to play the new Pokemon games on with me. During some preliminary tests right before the games release, hers outlasts my original unit by hours. So this is a much improved unit and I am debating just buying me one and gifting my old unit to a family friend or something. Plus new joy-cons always feel nice in your hands. And the colors are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Cameron III

customer_reviews.title: Missing Products
customer_reviews.text: The price was already heavily inflated. I was more than willing to pay. But how are you going to make me pay 700$ and not include everything? I was excited only to see the straps were missing. If i paid 700, i would want everything included.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Thank You Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This special edition of Nintendo Switch has been sold out everywhere. You would never know how happy I was when I see it available on Amazon! Initially, I thought it's a system mistake to let me place my order successfully until the time I saw the Switch shipped to my door only a couple of days later! Thank you, Amazon! This version of the Nintendo Switch is super cute so that I bought it even I have one before. I like it so much! Thank you, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Allen.L

customer_reviews.title: $300 for something Nintendo KNOWS doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Just like so many others, the left Joy Con died. Took about a week. Get a PlayStation or Xbox unless you like spending $300 on something that doesnt work and the company thats selling it KNOWS its selling you garbage
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: the animal crossing switch is legit!! 5⭐️ STARS!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be discouraged by the 1⭐️ star reviews; this is the real deal! You’re only allowed one animal crossing switch per amazon account to allow most people to get their hands on it without the extreme price gouge. The switch looks beautiful while docked & i’m a fan on the pastel blue/green & cream colored contrast. If you already played AC on another switch console, you’re now able to backup & transfer all of your save data by contacting Nintendo support. It’s a little tedious but, worth it if you have 100+ hours of hard work. 10/10 recommend to those who have been trying to get their hands on this in months! (GREAT HOLIDAY OR BIRTHDAY GIFT IDEA)
customer_reviews.author: Nyla

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not everything I purchased is there
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, however I purchased on black Friday with code for a free $25 gift card. I have received no such card, and now I don't see any notion that I purchased with the code.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Received a Chinese switch in a US box
customer_reviews.text: Scam alert! Be very careful. I just received this from Amazon, not a reseller, and everything was fine until I booted up the system and it was all in Chinese. Apparently the Chinese version is language locked and can’t play most games. Seems like the Chinese console got placed into a US box. Returning now.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Chu

customer_reviews.title: Defected
customer_reviews.text: Defected. Control keeps scrolling right. Seems like this is a common problem after some research. Was excited to come home and play PokeMon Shield. This ruined my night. Will be returning all items that I bought due to frustration. Update: instead of returning I went on YouTube and found a fix for my controls. After getting that fixed, I'll have to say this is by far the best system I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Alando McGreggor

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful Nintendo Switch Console I ever have, and probably ever will, seen. It's so smooth and relaxing to just look at. Worth the money as long as it's not bought from a scalper!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Noir

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful System
customer_reviews.text: We’re very lucky to get our hands on one. The system looks beautiful and it came in perfect condition. If you’re looking for a restock check out ACpocketnews on Twitter. They’re a great page that always posts updates when different stores restock. Please do not support these greedy people trying to mass purchase and resell this. Just be patient and I’m sure you’ll be able to get your hands on one :)
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Very entertaining but overpriced. All in all satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have only tried the game in hand held and tablet mode, I am also using a samsung galaxy charger because it is less bulky. So I cant comment on the dock and charger, though I wish they are working fine 😅 The game console is the v2 with the longer battery lifetime, it is amazing and very entertaining. I have played zelda and mario party and the graphics are amazing and very enjoyable I was lucky to get right before the prices went up and still I was thinking that 299.99 is overpriced given that there was no game with the console, so u had to buy a game usually ranging between 50-60$
customer_reviews.author: E.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great console, if you can get it for regular price
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace a Switch that was in for repairs because I missed Animal Crossing too much and I couldn't resist the special edition being available at regular price! I've only used it for a day so far but I've had a few issues with the joycons disconnecting randomly. No more than a mild annoyance so far but not an issue I had with my old Switch even after a year of near-daily play. Happy to see Switches being available for $300 again after 8 months of quarantine price gouging. As much as I love my Switch I wouldn't pay the $400+ some jerks have been asking while they're in low supply.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: took a lot of refreshing to find at $299 but was worth it
customer_reviews.text: Spent a lot of time looking to find a switch that wasn’t overpriced, and after doing lots of refreshing and looking at stock informer sites, I was finally able to purchase one. Is in perfect condition, brand new, and delivered on time! Definitely worth the wait of getting it at standard pricing, now to spend countless hours playing ACNH!
customer_reviews.author: J Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Innovative and fun.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. There are many minor hiccups that I already knew of before purchasing this product e.g. joycon drift, shakey joycons, hot while docked, online connectivity, dock scratch, etc. However, most of these risks i knew well ahead of time and so I was not bothered by them as most already have a diy fix for them as discovered by the Switch community. Great product, do some research before purchasing one, Nintendo methodology in developing their products can be a little strange at times but the good outweighs the bad with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL
customer_reviews.text: THE PRODUCT I RECEIVED WAS PREVIOUSLY USED!!! IT HAS PARENTAL PASSWORD, ONE CONTROL DAMAGED AND SINCE I GAVE IT AS A BIRTHDAY PRESENT A MONTH AFTER RECEIVED IT, NOW I CAN'T RETURN IT.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Make sure when used it all works
customer_reviews.text: Had to spend 69 dollars on joy cons because the ones that came wouldnt charge. Defective
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This switch is my baby
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT. It is exactly the same as any other switch but because I love animal crossing I had to get this one. Everything works, and I'm happy I found this special edition still in stock. A must for any animal crossing fan! I do wish it would have come with a copy of the game. But I'm happy I bought either way!
customer_reviews.author: Anchalee Nanakorn

customer_reviews.title: Missing part of my order
customer_reviews.text: I ordered using a black friday promo code to receive an amazon gift card with unit. The unit came as advertised in two days but there is not trace of a gift card anywhere. Nintendo's costumer service chat is useless, there is a robot who is supposed to direct your concern to the appropriate department but no one answers.
customer_reviews.author: JRS72

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly enjoyable in handheld mode!
customer_reviews.text: The switch is already of my favorite consoles I’ve ever owned. As an adult-I’ve been surprised by how much I play it in handheld mode. It’s nice to be able to sneak in some gaming time here and there at work when there is some downtime. And I actually find myself playing it in handheld mode pretty often at home when I’m watching football on the weekends. I’m glad I waited until this model with the improved battery life came out. Sometimes, I don’t have to put it on the dock to charge for 5 or 6 days, assuming I’m playing 30 minutes here and there. I highly recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dunn

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Almost twice the amount of the MSRP. You're a fraud and should be put in prison for taking innocent people's money. Like wtf dude c'mon.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy from resellers! These restock often!
customer_reviews.text: Glad to get one at retail price! This is by far the most fun system on the market today. If you see one for sale at $299.99 or less BUY IT! Just keep checking! That’s what I did. Try sites like zoolert (google it) to let you know when they’re in stock! I have faith in you!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Gaming Device Ever
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy i pulled the trigger and treated myself to this little beauty; I deserve it. I love the way it looks. I love how quickly it arrived. I love how well it was packaged. This unit arrived in perfect condition. This is my first experience with the Switch, so I don’t know enough about it yet in order to make a valid review. However, first impressions; I am happy I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Wallace

customer_reviews.title: ITS THE NEW MODEL!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! Bought this to play Pokémon since I waited 3 years for them to release games I had been waiting on. Sold my original switch, this one is the new model with the longer battery life! And it’s definitely noticeable. I have gone entire days (hour are a time usage) using it and not had to charge it till I got home or went to bed. One issue that still remains is the onboard WiFi on the console is still just as bad as it was in the first original model.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Paske

customer_reviews.title: Broken the very moment I opened the box
customer_reviews.text: Turned on the console for the first time and immediately received error code 2002-4153. I called Nintendo Support and I have to send it to their repair service. Didn't even make it to their profile setup. I have to wait 3 weeks now for it to return with the functionality that was expected upon purchase. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: 20pagesaday

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Nintendo Switch!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite pleased with my brand new Switch! I specifically got it because I am a fan of Animal Crossing and was happy I got to snag one on Amazon before they sold out. It works like a normal Switch and I actually sold my old one just to get this beauty. ^_^ This Switch is a SPECIAL EDITION and I hope they release more for the people that actually want it! PLEASE AVOID RESELLERS!!!
customer_reviews.author: MMayhem

customer_reviews.title: This is the Upgraded Version
customer_reviews.text: My launch day Nintendo bricked and is on the eternal repair list at Nintendo due to Covid. I got really lucky to get another here at retail. This is the new improved red box V2 one. Much better battery life and stabilizer. I have noticed the differences. If you love Nintendo, get it, much better than the Lite. You can play on TV or hand held. This Grandma who has been playing since the original Nintendo, plays on a 64 inch 4K Samsung and it looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: TLMKC

customer_reviews.title: Came missing Charger, was dirty, and it was a used product instead of new
customer_reviews.text: -was advertised as new was actually a used product -was dirty when I pulled it out of the box, hair and smudges covered it when I pulled it out of the box -didn't have the charging cable with it -the device data wasn't even deleted, it had previous users profiles and data still on it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo. Losing their game?
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty pathetic that in the 2.5 years since the launch of the Nintendo switch, all Nintendo has done is take away the "Switch" functionality with the Switch Lite, and improve the battery on the actual Switch. Not to mention all the features lacking from the software that should have been implemented before the launch of the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Rosander

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: EDIT; added photos so you all can see this beautiful switch! I have waited for this particular switch since it came out in March 2020, the Animal Crossing Edition switch! Firstly, this switch is a gorgeous color and the little animal crossing details are super cute! Now, the switch started up fine and hasn't given me any problems yet, it charges as it should (got to my house on low battery) and the joycon attachments seem to work properly! It's super cool being able to control the switch with the Joycon not being attached! I played Mario Kart 8 on my switch and it runs beautifully! Everything works as it should!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, cute edition
customer_reviews.text: Got in today after two days from purchasing even though it said delivery would take longer! Pleasantly surprised. It’s much cuter in person than I expected. Glad I just waited patiently for the Switch is be back in stock than pay those high prices scalpers were selling them for. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I can play and explore in games for 7+ hours before needing to connect to the charger. The transition from handheld to tv display is almost seamless (just a slight lag before the display pops up on the tv). I love being able to stay and play at home or take it on the go with me.
customer_reviews.author: Jaiana

customer_reviews.title: DON’T GIVE IN TO PRICE GOUGES
customer_reviews.text: Use apps like HotStock and Twitter bots like @_kinnybot to notify you instantly of switch restocks at retail $299. It may take a few days so be patient! It took me about a week or two at most. I missed a Walmart and a Best Buy one but I got lucky on Amazon thanks to kinnybot. So it is possible to get it without price gouges.
customer_reviews.author: LarranceCotton

customer_reviews.title: Misinformation on items being new and return policy
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after 3 weeks. Wouldnt come on and I returned it and now my child cannot find one for over 300 more then I paid
customer_reviews.author: bridget

customer_reviews.title: BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful thing I’ve ever held in my hands as a die hard AC fan.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Cute edition and peaceful colors
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and cute edition. Fast delivery. And feel lucky to get one during the 30 minutes' window on release date.
customer_reviews.author: a custom

customer_reviews.title: Comes in a GameStop box with "refurbished" all over it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal but it doesn't tell you anywhere in the post that it doesn't come in original packaging. It even shows it in the Nintendo box. I had to seek and buy an original empty box off eBay Because my son knows about GameStop and believes in Santa still. I didn't want any doubt put in his head. A heads up anywhere in the post would've been nice is all I'm saying. Still a good deal but plan on adding $20+ and buying a box from eBay if you want it in the box as shown.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: A+++++++
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today( one day earlier then was told so that's a plus) took it out and plugged it in. My 8yr old daughter hasn't put it down since. And for all the people wondering and asking it is the newer model with the longer battery life, yes it is the one with the longer battery life so buy it now because no ones selling the new ones just very few and they’re going fast
customer_reviews.author: James Meehan

customer_reviews.title: The scalping is ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: Good console if you can get it for MSRP, it took me weeks of trying to buy before I was able to get through the checkout process with all the scalpers buying them up within minutes. Don't pay over MSRP, the shortage is temporary.
customer_reviews.author: ThisIsNotMyRealName

customer_reviews.title: Just the perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ask if she could have the Nintendo Switch, so i log on to amazon to look for one and when my daughter saw that they were selling the Animal Crossing Edition she asked me if she could please have that one. I was more than please to buy the animal crossing Edition because it was only at $299.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: garbage durability don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: the joy cons were having tons of problems 2 weeks after purchasing. this product has zero durability regardless of how careful you are. The games are almost all overpriced and i regret buying. especially since I was so excited to get it
customer_reviews.author: leo Vlaze

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but...
customer_reviews.text: The Joycons are painted. Nintendo officially stated not to clean them with alcohol, and I've heard of the paint rubbing off for some users. It's pretty ridiculous that they're so fragile. The rest of the console looks great though! The dock itself is beautiful; It is molded in that wonderful cream colored plastic, and so are the Joycon straps! It's just such a shame that they cheaped out with the Joycons.
customer_reviews.author: Mysti

customer_reviews.title: Mostly as described, $30 holiday listing was phony
customer_reviews.text: Factory, but the $30 reward/rebate was obviously a scamazon issue. Shoulda bought it at target, a retailer at least will qualify the $30 rebate. And acknowledge it actually existed. Class action anyone?
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: Most definitely worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: I wanted one of these bad bois back in March, I missed preorder and didn’t wanna pay $500 or more. I’m beyond happy that Nintendo decided to release more of these. The console is beautiful in person and was 1000% worth the wait. Snag one of these while you can!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Know It Was A Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I'm glad I have a switch but didn't realize the new switch was still only getting sold for the same amount as $300. I honestly didn't know I was getting ripped off until everyone told me I was. While the design and colors are super cute I'm really sad they jacked the price up and I had no idea.
customer_reviews.author: Wynter Lee

customer_reviews.title: Loving the Switch!
customer_reviews.text: I travel often for work, so needed something to do in hotels and long flights. The Switch hits the mark. This newer version has great battery life, i never had the old one with the shorter life, but no complaints on this one. I immediately jumped in with the old NES and SNES games you can get by subscribing to the online platform. They look great and play great. Also have been playing Link's Awakening and Super Mario Odyssey, beautiful games and looking forward to more. Seamless switching between big screen and small screen is really impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Seter

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo did it Again!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Console! Nintendo truly knows how to design a solid gaming console from the portability of the Switch and being able to play it on the TV. What I love about the Switch is the games are actually full length instead of the shorter and more casual games on the 3DS. The games are expensive but the PS4 and Xbox were too when they first came out. The Switch is still a fairly new console and a lot of great ports are coming to it. I always look out for deals and end up with games for $40. Overall I truly am enjoying the Switch being an owner of a PS4 Pro and Xbox One S.
customer_reviews.author: MoneyInTheWalls

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hybrid console.
customer_reviews.text: Love the thing, being able to play a lot of these games at home or out and about is definitely a winning situation. I can't compare the battery life to the previous Switch but I haven't had a chance to kill it yet so great job Nintendo.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley H

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be brand new
customer_reviews.text: Item was in perfect condition when arrived. Shipped faster then expected. Four stars do to no manual, rather easy set up even without documents. I feel I was one of the last buyers at below three hundred dollars. This is the updated unit with extended battery life. No visuable damage at all. Unit runs perfectly, shipping box arrived undamaged, everything package neatly. Unit appeared to be brand new. Just decided to give this five stars, I honestly have no issues with item or seller. Would buy again from seller.
customer_reviews.author: David Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the switch. Ultimate for the gaming dad. Game anywhere anytime.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wilson

product_meta.title: Nintendo Switch with Gray Joy‑Con - HAC-001(-01)
product_meta.description:
Style:Console| Color:Gray HAC-001(-01)Get the gaming system that lets you play the games you want, wherever you are, however you like. Includes the Nintendo Switch console and Nintendo Switch dock in black, and left and right Joy‑Con controllers in a contrasting gray. Also includes all the extras you need to get started. Model number: HAC-001(-01) (product serial number begins with “XKW”) This model includes battery life of approximately 4.5 - 9 hours. The battery life will depend on the games you play. For instance, the battery will last approximately 5.5 hours for The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild (games sold separately). 

Introducing Nintendo Switch, the new home video game system from Nintendo. In addition to providing single and multiplayer thrills at home, the Nintendo Switch system can be taken on the go so players can enjoy a full home console experience anytime, anywhere. The mobility of a handheld is now added to the power of a home gaming system, with unprecedented new play styles brought to life by the two new Joy-Con controllers.

PLAY ANYWHERE

Home Gaming System

At home the main unit rests in the Nintendo Switch dock, which connects the system to the TV and lets you play with family and friends in the comfort of your living room.

On-the-Go

Lift Nintendo Switch from the dock and instantly transition to handheld mode for on-the-go gaming. By sharing Joy-Con, players can go head-to-head while away from home. You can also enjoy the same great games in tabletop mode by using the included stand to prop the system up.

New Play Styles

Remove the detachable Joy-Con from either side of Nintendo Switch for more play styles:

 * One player can use a Joy-Con in each hand
 * Two players can each take one
 * Multiple Joy-Con can be employed by numerous people for a variety of gameplay options (additional Joy-Con sold separately)
 * Slip a set of Joy-Con into a Joy-Con grip accessory, mirroring a more traditional controller. Or, select an optional Nintendo Switch Pro Controller. 

Bring together up to 8 Nintendo Switch systems for local face-to-face multiplayer. 

Are Parental Controls available for the Nintendo Switch console? 

Yes, a robust set of options is included to help both parents and kids have the best possible gaming experience. 
Parents can set controls on the system, or use the free Nintendo Switch Parental Controls app to set restrictions on games and purchases, monitor gaming time, and more.
feature_bullets: 3 Play Styles: TV Mode, Tabletop Mode, Handheld Mode
4.5-9+ Hours of Battery Life *Will vary depending on software usage conditions
Connects over Wi-Fi for multiplayer gaming; Up to 8 consoles can be connected for local wireless multiplayer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars23,242 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
